actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide that in determining the amount of retire pay, retirement pay, or retainer pay payable to any enlisted man, all service shall be counted which would have been counted for the same purposes if he were a commissioned officer.

summary.text: Provides that in determining the amount of retired pay, retirement pay, or retainer pay payable to any enlisted man in the Armed Forces heretofore or hereafter retired for disability or length of service, all service shall be counted which would have been counted for the same purposes as if he were a commissioned officer. Provides that the Act shall not be applicable to any person whose original entry on active duty occurred after June 1, 1958.

titles.title: A bill to provide that in determining the amount of retire pay, retirement pay, or retainer pay payable to any enlisted man, all service shall be counted which would have been counted for the same purposes if he were a commissioned officer.
